title: The Feelings in the Tone
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>….Fuuh. That was a wonderful performance, Maki-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Thanks<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Though, I’m not really familiar with classical music….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Even then you call my performance wonderful? Well, it’s fine<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Despite that, I could really tell that Maki-san loves to play the piano! That’s why I think your performance was wonderful! I’ve heard it from Rin and the others, but you really do love piano huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Haah!? Rin and the others…. What did they even say? It’s just that I’ve been playing for a long time. Of course I don’t hate it either, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu, Maki-san, you’re really shy aren’t you? The feeling of “I love this” was written all over the tone of your music!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Aah, geez! Alright, I get it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
